snippet.title: Luigi's Mansion: Premium Deluxe - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Update Discord Links, Join To Download My Mods

https://discord.gg/7ZUZjTSK7v or https://tinyurl.com/bd7tj45y
https://discord.gg/lilith-official or https://tinyurl.com/yyzuhpnx ► Join my Discord Server to download my mods
https://discord.gg/7ZUZjTSK7v or https://tinyurl.com/j3a4699p
https://discord.gg/lilith-official or https://tinyurl.com/yyzuhpnx

Please consider following one of my socials, Youtube, Twitter, Twitch, ECT, id really appreciate if you did as I post lots of frequent Modding content, hacks, mods, videos, tweets, all kinds of stuff. Join the Discord server especially if you'd like to stay up to date. Anyway, hope you enjoy the video! Thanks and hope you like it!

► Visit My Twitter - https://tinyurl.com/5cnptcr8

► Visit My Twitch - https://tinyurl.com/jtmj4nb4

► Visit My Website - https://portableproductions.weebly.com

► Visit My Youtube - https://tinyurl.com/yrh6638u

► Visit My Patreon - https://tinyurl.com/tjjsyzj2

► Visit My Discord - https://discord.gg/7ZUZjTSK7v

An expansion to the original Luigi's Mansion for Nintendo Gamecube. This is a full 10 minute overview of everything you'll find in this brand new revamped and redefined experience! Play Luigi's Mansion like never before and experience brand new features including things like toggling the blackout, removed on disc content, new overhauled graphics and much much more!

0:00 Introduction
0:43 Graphical Overhaul
3:35 Speedy Spirit Overhaul + Additional Speedy Spirits
4:00 Complete Unused Content Restoration
5:00 Additional Features + Quality Of Life Changes
5:55 Explore The Mansion Post Game!
6:35 Achievements and Unlockables
7:40 Conclusion
9:15 Patreon Supporters
